comments.content:
Depending on the age of your sample, it was probably hand lettered.  
This is in the ball park, but there may be something out there closer...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150102213502im_/http:/typophile.com/files/new-1_4415.png)

This is [Voodoo Script.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150102213502/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontry/script1-voodoo-script/)

I can't find an exact match either, but you may like **[LHF Ephemera](http://web.archive.org/web/20150102213502/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Letterhead&ffam=Ephemera%20LHF%20Regular%20-%20Regular&fid=c998c4c99d51622921c35c878e040c5f&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=Major%20Taylor&fit=1)** by Tom Kennedy (Letterhead Fonts, 2002)

Really thought I could find it... Anyway, some alternatives: [Fan Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150102213502/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/fan-script), [Ballpark Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150102213502/http:/letterheadfonts.com/fonts/ballparkscript.php), [Chicago Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150102213502/http:/letterheadfonts.com/fonts/chicagoscript.php)
